text:
A Moment of Surrender

<setup: Raskolnikov kneeling in a square, emotional>
<optional narration: A spark ignites within him.>
Raskolnikov: I feel it... this blissful release!

<youth>: He’s boozed!

<workman>: He’s going to Jerusalem, saying goodbye!

<third>: Quite a young man, too!

---

<setup: Raskolnikov walking, troubled expression>
<optional narration: The weight of his secret lingers.>
Raskolnikov: I am a murderer...

<onlooker>: There’s no knowing who’s a gentleman now. 

<Sonia, hiding>: Raskolnikov...

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov experiences a profound emotional moment of humility and connection to the world, kneeling and kissing the ground, before heading towards the police office.
